mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_overseas_info(overseas_id, purpose, nation, start_date, end_date, agency, reason) VALUES(user_overseas_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{purpose}, #{nation}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{agency}, #{reason})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_overseas_info SET purpose = #{purpose}, nation = #{nation}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, agency = #{agency}, reason = #{reason}
mapper.select: SELECT purpose, nation, start_date, end_date, agency, reason FROM user_overseas_info WHERE id=#{VALUE}
